name: SimCity
overview:
A sophisticated city simulator where the future depends on your decisions!

Tired of traffic jams, crime, and soaring taxes? Enter into SimCity and, as mayor, take control!

Start with a fledgling town (you name it yourself) and build it into a metropolis. Or, take on the challenge of rescuing a city overwhelmed with problems. Either way, taxes, zoning, crime, transportation, education, fire control, and other critical issues are in your hands. City residents rate your performance on an annual basis and list what they regard as the most pressing problems.

Build it all yourself or have the computer handle the details. But watch out! Natural disasters, airplane crashes, and even a monster lizard threaten to demolish your growing city. And what seems like an easy decision can set off a chain reaction leading to unexpected results!

The quality of life of the community depends on you. Will you build the'ideal city? Or will disgruntled citizens leave you with a ghost town?

Award winning PC game comes to the NES!
